concept.title: GCSMOOTH Command
concept.shortdesc: Creates a smooth geometric constraint on 2D entities.

conbody.p: Create a smooth constraint to ensure two splines maintain fluid geometric continuity between them.

section.title: Methods to create a smooth constraint
section.p:
There is one method to begin creating a smooth constraint:
Select first spline entity

dlentry.dd: Begin creating a smooth constraint by selecting a spline curve then:
Select a second spline entity. The first spline maintains its position while the second spline stretches, as necessary, to smoothly connect to the first spline.
